llm_text:
Why:
- payment_format_ach (value=1) strongly increased the model score (SHAP +3.02638), indicating the ACH payment method was the primary driver.
- amount_paid (12249.7) and amount_received (12249.7) both increased the score (SHAP +0.84 and +0.77), so the payment size contributed to the flag.
- to_bank (1490) increased the score (SHAP +0.497), implicating the receiving bank as a positive driver.
- payment_currency_euro (value=1) increased the score (SHAP +0.48), so the euro currency choice also raised the alert likelihood.

Conclusion:
The model flagged this transaction mainly because it was an ACH payment (payment_format_ach=1) of ~12,249.7 (amount_paid/amount_received) sent in euros to bank 1490. If ACH payments, euro currency, or payments to bank 1490 are correlated with higher risk in the model, then a manual review is recommended.
